Class GeoVizComponent

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class GeoVizComponent
extends com.codename1.ui.Component
    A Component for displaying GeoJSON data.

      • getProjection

        public com.codename1.maps.Projection getProjection()
        Gets the current projection for this component. This can project to any arbitrary 2D space. The component will apply its own additional projection to ultimately project it to the component's space.
        Returns:
        the projection
